{{Description|After the accident at the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering]], many masterless constructs went out of control, wandering aimlessly about the caverns around the shore of the lake, waiting for orders that will never come.<br>If you can destroy the out-of-control [[Clockwork Meka|clockwork meka]], you will obtain the precious artifacts within.}}
'''Denouement of Sin''' is a [[Domain of Blessing]] located in [[Belleau Region]], [[Fontaine]].

==Ley Line Disorder==
The following Ley Line Disorders are applied in this domain:
{| class="wikitable align-center"
!Level
!Ley Line Disorder
|-
!I - IV
|When a character recovers or loses HP, all your party members' CRIT DMG increases by 7% for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 10 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently.
|}

==Challenge Features==
Each level in this domain has the following Challenge Features:
{| class="wikitable"
!Level
!Challenge Features
|-
!III - IV
|<li>When a character's current HP increases or decreases, all party members will receive a CRIT DMG Bonus. As such, place characters with Healing abilities in the party to defeat your opponents more effectively.</li>
|}
